![Image 6](https://www.nyc.gov/assets/home/images/events/2025/Water-Dances.jpg)

Summer on the Hudson: Global Water Dances Jun 14, 2pm to 6pm[Locomotive Lawn](https://maps.google.com/maps?q=Locomotive+Lawn)

Join [Global Water Dances New York](https://www.nycgovparks.org/events/2025/06/14/GlobalWaterDancesNY.org) and the Musical Seeds Project in participatory activities to advocate for safe water for all. This interactive educational session includes learning dances and listening to music about water and the planting season, as well as performances focused on appreciation, concern and care of clean water for all.

Global Water Dances is joined by Ramapo Munsee Lenape Native American guides, [Parparim Dancers](https://israelidanceinstitute.org/parparim-ensemble/), [Art in Motion](https://aimdanceny.com/), Karen Eubanks with Melanin in Motion, [92NY](https://www.92ny.org/) youth dancers, [Jody Sperling/Time Lapse Dance](https://www.timelapsedance.com/), [Lori Belilove](https://www.isadoraduncan.org/), Wendy Joseph, and [House of Negesti](https://www.houseofnegesti.com/).

[![Image 7](http://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?zoom=13&size=140x140&maptype=roadmap&markers=icon:http://maps.google.com/mapfiles/ms/micons/blue-dot.png|40.7747774,-73.9925293&sensor=false)](https://maps.google.com/maps?q=Locomotive+Lawn "show event on a map")

##### Riverside Park South

[Visit the website](https://www.nycgovparks.org/events/2025/06/14/global-water-dances)

![Image 8](https://www.nyc.gov/assets/home/images/events/2025/biking.jpg)

NYC Parks Presents: The Season Opener Jun 14, 1pm to 5pm[Bike Track](https://maps.google.com/maps?q=Bike+Track)

All ages are invited to join NYC Parks at Rev. Wendell T. Foster Park for our season opener event. Join us as we kick off the season with an open jam riding event. This event is free and open to the public. Please note that helmets and registration are required, registration begins at 12:00 p.m.

[![Image 9](http://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?zoom=13&size=140x140&maptype=roadmap&markers=icon:http://maps.google.com/mapfiles/ms/micons/blue-dot.png|40.8318182,-73.9252444&sensor=false)](https://maps.google.com/maps?q=Bike+Track "show event on a map")

[go](https://www1.nyc.gov/events/nyc-parks-presents-the-season-opener/530316/1)[](https://www.nyc.gov/calendar/api/ics.htm?id=530316&sequence=1 "add to calendar")

![Image 10](https://www.nyc.gov/assets/home/images/events/2025/Glitter-Art.jpg)

Sparkle & Shine: A Glitter Art Adventure!Jun 14, 1pm to 3pm[Buz O' Rourke Playground - 33rd Road and 214th Place](https://maps.google.com/maps?q=Buz+O%27+Rourke+Playground+-+33rd+Road+and+214th+Place)

Let creativity shine in this fun-filled glitter art workshop designed just for kids! Through exciting hands-on projects, young artists will explore color, texture, and sparkle while creating dazzling masterpieces. This workshop encourages self-expression, imagination, and a whole lot of shimmering fun!

Perfect for children of all skill levels, “Sparkle & Shine” is a magical way to make art that truly glows!

[![Image 11](http://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?zoom=13&size=140x140&maptype=roadmap&markers=icon:http://maps.google.com/mapfiles/ms/micons/blue-dot.png|40.7710019,-73.7715221&sensor=false)](https://maps.google.com/maps?q=Buz+O%27+Rourke+Playground+-+33rd+Road+and+214th+Place "show event on a map")
